channel.title: Youth on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Youth on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mango Tree War
item.description: Everybody on Pike Street know dat de BEST julie mango tree belong to Miss Doreen. Everybody also know dat Miss Doreen does guard dem mango like gold. So when Speedeet come up wid a plan to ’liberate’ some mango… well, yuh know how DIS gon end.

item.title: De Boys Seh: Development Bank Loans, Mash Prep, and Why Big People Love de Word 'Ambitious'
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar try to understand interest-free loans, wonder who is paying for Mash costumes, and discover that big people use de word ‘ambitious’ for everything.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mash Costume Crisis
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar try to figure out Mashramani costumes on a budget of exactly zero dollars. Wilar has a plan. Speedeet has doubts. Miss Sharma’s clothesline has feathers.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Hospital Cat Hunt
item.description: Speedeet brother Derek get bite by carpet labaria at Tumatumari and end up in Georgetown Hospital. But while de family visiting, Speedeet and Wilar find a different kind of adventure in de hospital compound.

item.title: De Boys Seh: Oil Talk, Border Soldiers, and Birthday Party Entry Fees
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar from Pike Street, Kitty try to understand oil contracts, wonder why soldiers watching de border, and complain about paying to attend birthday parties.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Solar Panel Mix-Up
item.description: Speedeet cousin from Rupununi come to visit and bring story about the government solar panels. But Wilar grandmother got she own ideas about 'free electricity.'

item.title: De Boys Seh: Hotels, Digital Records, and Why Adults Confusing
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar from Pike Street, Kitty break down fancy hotels, digital health records, and why de women cricket team is de real MVP.

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar and the Mystery of the Missing Medical Records
item.description: When Speedeet’s grandmother can’t find her medical file at the clinic, the two friends discover that going digital isn’t as simple as pressing a button.

item.title: De Boys Seh: Wha Speedeet & Wilar Talking About Dis Week
item.description: Speedeet and Wilar share dem thoughts on cricket, video games, school lunch, and why adults always saying ‘back in me days.’ Short takes from two 12-year-olds!

item.title: Speedeet & Wilar: De Mango Tree Incident
item.description: Speedeet got a plan fuh get de biggest mango from Mr. Chan shop yard, and Wilar know is trouble but he going anyway. Wha could go wrong?
